subject: simsonn manager
description_text: I can't download simsonn manager. It says page not found. I tried all three versions for pro x ultra. I purchased the pedals on 11/18/25. Received them last week, trying to set up now, but can't get your software. Please help soon. Randy Waugh 256-679-2359

conversations.body_text: Please disregard. It worked with Google Chrome, didn't work with Microsoft Edge. On Sat, Dec 20, 2025 at 10:09 AM service@simsonn.com
